section.name: Description
section.p: The shard project is intended to be an implementation of the d20 game engine. The d20 game engine is the ruleset that powers games such as Dungeons and Dragons, and Neverwinter Nights.

The goal of this project is to create a lightweight embeddable game engine that will handle many of the aspects of the d20 engine and allow for other applications to build upon them. The d20 engine's standard reference document that will provide the model to complete this project.

ul.li: reusable engine for either webapplication or client side tools/games.
flexible API developed using well known design patterns
basic SRD 3.5 dataset available for "out of the box" functionality
